The next part will be the cylindrical surface connecting to the flat rectangle. Part 2: Cylindrical Surface The second part of the CAD model is the cylindrical surface connecting to the flat rectangular surface. The final shape of this part should match the provided "final_shape" description. After completing these steps, the CAD model assembly will be complete.
